data.title: Dothan Radio and TV
data.meta_description: This is a list of radio and television stations serving the greater Dothan area, including selected station from Panama City, Florida.
data.text:
These FM stations serve all or part of the Dothan area, including Jackson County Florida and Early County Georgia. It also includes stations that serve all or most of the Fort Rucker area, including Enterprise and Ozark. This list is somewhat subjective and is only a guideline of what can be received over the greater Dothan area.

This is Nielsen market #188 for radio, and #172 for television.

For more information on these Dothan FM stations, follow the data link. There you'll find technical data and station histories for many stations. If you wish to add to Dothan's history pages, use the Contact Us link on the main page. Thanks!

These AM stations serve all or part of the Dothan area, including parts of southwest Georgia, northern Florida and the Fort Rucker area. The AM list is subjective and by no means a guide to what you can or cannot receive while within the greater Dothan area. Generally, stations not licensed to Dothan do not serve the entire area and focus on programming of local or regional interest.

For more information on these Dothan AM stations, follow the data link. There you'll find technical data and station histories for many stations. If you wish to add to Dothan's history pages, use the Contact Us link on the main page. Thanks!

The listed full power television stations generally serve the entire Dothan market. All of the low power stations serve a much smaller portion of the area. The TV list includes all Dothan market stations, regardless of their intended or implied coverage area. Listed just below the full power digital stations are the digital LPTV stations, followed by the analog LPTV television stations.

For more information on these Dothan TV stations, follow the data link. There you'll find technical data and station histories for many stations. If you wish to add to Dothan's history pages, use the Contact Us link on the main page. Thanks!
